section.name: What is left in this Karma R1.0 ?
section.p: We are currently developing `Karma R1.0 Beta 2`. There's a bit of functionality with bugs, and we are trying our best to get rid of them as soon as possible.
When we are out of bugs, we'll release `Karma R1.0 RC1`. Check our latest file releases regularly or better, monitor file releases so you are notified by email when a new release is available.
